audio_description: Today we're going to see how to make Thalassery Chicken Biryani. First, we'll prepare the Bista, which means fried onions. I’ve taken one large onion, sliced thin. Also, 1 tbsp raisins and 8 cashew nuts. You can use more if desired.

audio_description: 1 tbsp tomato, 1 tsp black cumin (shah jeera), 3 red chilies, 2 inches cinnamon. Roast and grind all together. Use Jeerakasala or Khaima rice. If unavailable, basmati is fine.
